name: Darker Tumblr
description:
!!Enable SSL in the Account section of the Tumblr options!! Thank you for 75,000 installs! Darker Tumblr dashboard to help save your eyes a little bit. This style was created in Chrome and is only supported fully in Chrome, so use at your own discretion.
  • Restores original header width
  • Restores original post widths for images
  • Puts the Source link back at the top left and fixes tags
  • Removes "Sponsored" posts and in-line Blog Recommendations
  • Styles some aspects of XKit including One-Click Posting
Follow me: http://burningcaskets.tumblr.com/ | If you have questions please send me an ask when you post here so I'll see it faster.
additional_info: Edited April 21st, 2016: Fixed the message dropdown colors. Some tweaks/bugfixes. Full changelog here.

discussions.name: Really nice except for some issues
XKit - Read More Now, ReplyViewer, TagViewer
the theme badly needs to be updated june 2017
